title: Cherry and oat muffins
ingredients: ['85g (3oz) rolled oats', '100g (3½oz) plain flour', '85g (3oz) wholemeal flour', '35g (1¼oz) wheatgerm, preferably toasted', '6½ tbsp caster sugar', '1 tsp baking powder', '½ tsp bicarbonate of soda', '350ml (12fl oz) buttermilk', '3 tbsp olive oil', '1 medium egg', 'grated zest of 2 oranges', '115g (4oz) dried cherries']
